result.execSummary:
The defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay all costs and surcharges including the mandatory $200.00 DNA surcharge by 03-19-16. If unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered filed against the defendant.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose Ivan Rodriguez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information/Complaint. Judgment of conviction entered.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 7 days in the House of Correction, CONCURRENT to any other sentence with credit for (0) days time served.  
Court ordered defendant pay all costs and surcharges by 3-19-2016.  If unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered filed against the defendant.
Court ordered defendant pay mandatory $200.00 DNA Surcharge by 3-19-2016.  If unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered filed against the defendant.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk jks

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pretrial conference conducted.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Pick N Save located at 6760 W. National Ave.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  Defendant Jose Ivan Rodriguez in custody.  David A. Feiss appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 27, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jose Ivan Rodriguez
Current: 1565 W. Lapham St., Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 02-20-2015)
Prior: 1565 West Mitchell Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
